p: Forty-three compounds were identified from the aroma of oven-dried black morel, comprised 91.09% of the total aromas, and benzene acetaldehyde (8.63%), 5-hydroxy-2-methyl-3-hexanone (10.43%), and 2(5 H)-furanone (13.95%) were the main components ( Figure 2(B)). Thirteen compounds were identified from the lipophilic extracts of oven-dried black morel, comprised 96.59% of the total extracts, and steroids were the main components (92.41%).
